Introduction

VIINI, also known by his full name Kwon Hyunbin or simply Hyunbin, is a South Korean model, singer, rapper and actor under Ghost Studio. He is a former member of the project group JBJ. He made his solo debut on August 19, 2019, with the mini album Dimension.

In April 2017, he participated in the survival show Produce 101 Season 2 under KPLUS, but was eliminated in the finale, finishing 22nd. Later that year, on October 18, he made his official debut as a member of a project group JBJ. The group disbanded on April 30, 2018.

On January 3, 2024, it was announced that Hyunbin had departed from YG Entertainment after his contract expired and decided not to renew. On March 3rd, it was announced the he signed with Ghost Studio.
